response.overview: "In a distant galaxy, a civil war breaks out in the peaceful planet of Archapada. Commander Swedana has gone berserk and sends his soldiers to ravage the cities. Lord Narada calls on a troop of freedom fighters with supernatural powers to stop the violence, but they are unable to overpower Swedana. There is only one fighter, Saka, who can challenge Swedana. Master Batara must locate him as the only hope of restoring peace to the galaxy." - Official Synopsis.  Hong Kong English dub of an Indonesian Cartoon
response.title: Galaxy Patrol - Peace Mission
